message: Starting investigation of dashboard frontend code to understand agent display and identify reviewer agent distinguishing fields
Found agent display components - examining Dashboard and AgentTree for rendering logic
Searching for reviewer agent creation logic to understand their exact data structure

Investigation complete. Found: Reviewer agents have phase_index=-1 and agent_type starting with 'reviewer-'. Frontend displays agents in TaskDetail.tsx (lines 244-289), Dashboard.tsx, and AgentTree.tsx. Recommended visual distinctions: purple/indigo theme, 'Reviewer' badge, gavel icon, separate review panel section.
